msysstat.h(7) Miscellaneous Information Manual msysstat.h(7)

NAME

msysstat.h — file status flags

LIBRARY

library “libmjo”

SYNOPSIS

#include <msysstat.h>

#define S_IRUSR
#define S_IWUSR
#define S_IXUSR
#define S_IRGRP
#define S_IWGRP
#define S_IXGRP
#define S_IROTH
#define S_IWOTH
#define S_IXOTH
#define S_IRWXU
#define S_IRWXG
#define S_IRWXO
#define stat
#define fstat

INCLUDES

<sys/stat.h>

DESCRIPTION

Provides stat and fstat routines along with file status flags on platforms that does not implement them.

July 22, 2020 OpenBSD 7.0
